title: Form3, a quiet giant in UK fintech, raises $60M at a $570M valuation
content:
Form3, a startup building tools to connect financial players with each other to enable account payments, has it raised $60 million to continue expanding its business.

title: Threads is not working on its own DM system yet, but it might make it easier to send Instagram messages
content:
The Threads team is not yet working on a separate inbox or a direct messaging system for the social network, despite user demands and will continue to use Instagram inbox. However, the company might make it easier to send messages to Instagram right from the Threads app. App researcher Adwaith Varma posted on Threads an unreleased Threads […]

title: Google loses appeal against EU’s $2.7B Shopping antitrust case, as bloc also wins $15B Apple state aid appeal
content:
Google has once again lost in its bid to overturn a 2017 antitrust decision by the European Commission. The bloc found its shopping comparison service had broken competition rules — hitting Alphabet, Google’s parent, with an at-the-time record-breaking €2.42 billion penalty (around $2.7 billion at current exchange rates) and ordering changes to how it operates […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: Formo gets investors’ mouths watering with Koji protein-based animal-free cheese
content:
A love of food — and, well, cheese — has landed German fermentation startup Formo‘s co-founder Roman Plewka and its team a hefty $61 million Series B round to keep scaling production of their climate-friendly, animal-free cheese. The Berlin-based startup’s first products use a base of Koji protein, a type of fungal microorganism that’s been […]

title: Seattle Cybertruck became fleeting tourist destination
content:
You could argue whether Cybertruck owners crave attention, but attention they receive, often by critics poking fun at the vehicles. People seem to particularly delight at Cybertruck mishaps, as when one arrived on Nantucket back in May and promptly got stuck in the sand.  Perhaps it’s little wonder then that a damaged Cybertruck in Seattle’s […]

title: Online, led by social media, overtakes TV as the most popular source of news in the UK, Ofcom says
content:
Online platforms have now overtaken TV for the first time as the most popular resource for news among adult consumers, at 71% versus 70%, according to new research.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: Audible recruits voice actors to train audiobook-generating AI
content:
Audible, Amazon’s audiobook business, on Monday announced that it’ll use AI trained on professional narrators’ voices to generate new audiobook recordings. A select, U.S.-based cohort of audiobook narrators will be invited to train AI on their voices starting this week, Audible said. The trained AI will be used to make recordings, and narrators will have […]

title: Confluent acquires streaming data startup WarpStream
content:
Confluent plans to use WarpStream's cloud-native solution to fill out its portfolio by offering a new service (Confluent WarpStream) that can sit in between its fully-managed Confluent Cloud and self-managed Confluent Platform.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

Confluent plans to use WarpStream's cloud-native solution to fill out its portfolio by offering a new service (Confluent WarpStream) that can sit in between its fully-managed Confluent Cloud and self-managed Confluent Platform.

title: Apple sets lower iPhone 16 Pro prices in India
content:
The iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max models now start at 119,900 rupees ($1,428) and 144,900 rupees ($1,725) respectively, compared to their iPhone 15 Pro counterparts which were priced at 134,900 rupees ($1,606) and 159,900 rupees ($1,904) at launch.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: What is Apple Intelligence, when is it coming and who will get it?
content:
Apple Intelligence was designed to leverage things that generative AI already does well, like text and image generation, to improve upon existing features.
